member.name: IDirectManipulationCompositor.AddContent
member.summary: Associates content (owned by the caller) with the compositor, assigns a composition device to the content, and specifies the position of the content in the composition tree relative to other composition visuals.

param.name: content
param.para: The content to add to the composition tree.
content is placed between parentVisual and childVisual in the composition tree.

param.name: device
param.para: The device used to compose the content.
param.div: Note device is created by the application.

param.name: parentVisual
param.para: The parent visuals in the composition tree of the content being added.
parentVisual must also be a parent of childVisual in the composition tree.

param.name: childVisual
param.para: The child visuals in the composition tree of the content being added.
parentVisual must also be a parent of childVisual in the composition tree.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.summary: Represents a compositor object that associates manipulated content with a drawing surface, such as canvas (Windows app using JavaScript) or Canvas (Windows Store app using C++, C#, or Visual Basic).
